name: TVGuru
0:
”Alexa, ask T. V. Guru if Last Man Standing is canceled.”
”Alexa, ask T. V. Guru is Scorpion canceled?”
”Alexa, ask T. V. Guru for help.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. v. guru
des:
In this initial release, the TV Guru skill can provide you with information whether your favorite show is cancelled.

Future iterations will provide series, season, show information, actors/actresses, and scheduling information about any TV show you might be interested in.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
